title: Enhancing Communication for the Deaf and Hard-of-Hearing: A Custom Deep Learning Model-Based Approach for Real-Time Sign Language Recognition and Translation
desc: Custom deep model for real-time SLR + word translation; SOTA-level accuracy (e.g., 86.15% on WLASL-2000). Accessibility-focused, real-world validation.

title: DPMAS-Net: A Privacy-Preserving Deep Learning Model for EMG-Based Hand Gesture Recognition with Time-Frequency Domain Features
desc: Differential-privacy EMG gesture recognition; accuracy near non-private SOTA (e.g., Ninapro DB4 86.4% w/ privacy, 92.0% w/o). Strong across multiple datasets.

title: N2N2N: A Clean Data Independent Speech Enhancement Approach with Modified cGAN
desc: Noise-to-Noisy-to-Noise with modified cGAN + RAUNet generator; handles known-noise scenarios, strong PESQ/STOI/CBAK/COVL/SSNR at very low SNRs (e.g., −15 dB).

title: Bio-Markers Presence Detection Using Transfer and Ensemble Learning on Optical Coherence Tomography of Retinal Imagery
desc: Transfer + ensemble learning on retinal OCT for six biomarkers; FFT-based denoising and brightness/contrast tuning. Best combo: DenseNet169 + GoogLeNet. Acc 93.63%, F1 0.87.

title: WnD-UNET: A Waveform and Discrete Wavelet Coefficient-Based 1D Deep Learning Model for Single-Channel Noisy Speech Enhancement
desc: Concatenates waveform and db1 DWT features for robust speech enhancement. STOI 0.97 @ 5 dB and 0.79 @ −10 dB; strong generalization in very noisy settings.

title: VOIS+: A Video Over Intercom Service with Home Automation Features for Advanced Security and Safety
desc: Video intercom + smart home automation: face recognition, fire/electrical safety, remote monitoring/control; affordable and responsive system for home security.
